name: Episode 1 - Quetzalcoatlia
description:
Today, Quetzalcoatlia (Kwet-zul-COAT-lee-uh) is creating the Aztec Restoration series on the tezos network, with pieces available on HEN, TEIA and OBJKT.com. There are 27 pieces in the collection so far, and each one is a restoration of artworks from sacred aztec texts, particularly the 16th century Codex Borgia.

Buy this show AS AN NFT and then burn it to have your NFT project featured on the next episode by going to: https://www.hicetnunc.xyz/1minutenftpodcast
The show’s twitter profile: https://twitter.com/1MinuteNFTPod
Our website is: http://1minutenftpodcast.live
